Text: Opportunity on Dow Pipeline Cc Jpst Darren per our earlier conversation here are the facts related to the opportunity to service a plant in the Freeport area off of Dow The potential customer Don Owen has supplied this plant for the past years buying supply from Dow Dow does not want to be a supplier in the future but of course will transport Dow will quote only a year transport from Katy to the plant but the customer wants a minimum of years Other bids he is getting at Index less whatever transport The swing load is approx MMBtud but fairly steady he says Let me know if you have any interest or if I should pass this along to someone else Thanks PS The customer will give more info if we are interested but wanted to see if we have interest first and also if we had long term capacity on Dow

Tom Moore Jr Cc Following up conversations I have had with several of you I would appreciate your consideration of the following candidiate for a logistics position Tom Moore Jr is currently a securities manager for Fidelity Investments in the Dallas area but interested in seeking a position in a energy related business in Houston He has an undergraduate degree BBA from Baylor and an MBA from University of Dallas It is my understanding that you may be interviewing at this time or in the near future and I would appreciate your consideration of him for a position I will be happy to introduce you to him and provide additional information about Tom if you have an interest You may reach me at ext Thanks much

Sanchez Oil Gas d Harris County Texas Cc Daren Sanchez Oil Gas has wellstheir Highlander wells connected to HPL at Meter No These wells are flowing approx d and Sanchez would like to have a bid for the gas beginning December for year Their term will be up w HPL then Can we get a transport bid from HPL to wherever you need the gas and I can buy it at receipt point less their transport or we can buy it at the Meter I know the rate will not be pretty but there are other reasons Sanchez may prefer to have Enron buy their gas Lets discuss at your convenience There is no rush now buit Id like to be looking at it in the next month Thanks

FW ETOCO bid Intrastate pipes Cc Brian I asked Shauywn to send this to me as it shows that the rate HPL gave us for transport and the price they are apparently giving to ETOCO is close to apart although the current contract they have w ETOCO is in evergreen so the producer may be in for a rude awakening from HPL soonlet me know if you want to discuss more Thanks Original Message From Smith Shauywn Sent Thursday October AM To Zivley Jill T Subject ETOCO bid Intrastate pipes Jill Per your request below are the details of my interactions with ETOCO Inc On September th I spoke to Walter Cochran at Etoco and have the following notes from that conversation Friendly theyre moving most of their gas on HPL most was year term that has gone to evergreen and going month to month They dont do much hedging or other fancy stuff just simple gas contracts miles north of San Jacinto Monument d and expect that to increase on HPL getting HSC west side meter outside of Sealy d on HPL getting HSC getting dinged because of CO in gas North of Deer Park Jacinto Port d on Kinder Morgan getting of HSC Theyd definitely entertain bids on the gas but dont know what we can do with HPL moving it He deals with John Payton at HPL They have a day notice they have to give to get out of their current contract Also he said theyd take a few weeks to make a decision to switch anyway Compare our pricebid to what theyre getting and then see if were competitive enough to pursue a contract with them He gave me this to bid on day Sralla road field feeds into HPL meters Etoco Highlands pipeline meter day here and Etoco Hargrove Central point meter day here I offered bid of HSC Today October I followed up with him on how our bid fared since I hadnt ever heard back from him He was friendly about it but when I asked if we were close or on another planet he said another planet We were off by cents They dont really have anything on interstate pipes either so doubtful any reason for us to continue bidding here He would like to keep in touch in case anything changes down the road Let me know if you need additional info Shauywn

RE Meetings Cc NonPrivilegedpst Hello all Kimberly was too efficient and sent this out before I had a chance to call you We have a new Associate who recently joined our group He is new to Enron and will be helping with our Producer Focus efforts Since we sell a number of products including some of yours I would like to request minutes to an hour for you or someone else in your group to spend with Shauywn telling him about your business and how your group works with us Kimberly will be getting with you to set up a time if you are available Thank you for your assistance and time I appreciate it Original Message From Bates Kimberly Sent Monday August AM To Grass John Kelly Katherine L Lamadrid Victor Miller Kevin Druzbik Lisa Hawkins Craig Roberts Mike A Spence Tricia Quick Joan Ballard Phillip Smith Mark Nemec Gerald Ferries Nelson Whitehead James Cc Zivley Jill T Smith Shauywn Subject Meetings Please let me know your availability to meet with Jill Zivleys new associate Shauywn Smith I would like to set up the meetings starting this week Kimberly Bates East GasOrigination Fax

RE Aspect Contracts Cc Gerald a couple of comments Pricing does not change until nor do other provisions like the keep whole The way you have the contracts drafted it is as if we have new terms beginning now I think the producers will object to this and think we are trying to put something over on them now Can we make the new contracts effective Under Art Contract priceI have a questions about the of First of the Month Nominationwhat about the swing they getShouldnt it be of actuals subject to the keep whole Maybe I am the one confused but could you please call me to discuss Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October PM To Zivley Jill T Cc Perlingiere Debra Hesse Lisa Wallumrod Ellen Subject Aspect Contracts Attached are the two contracts which will replace the single original as we discussed Please review and let me know if you have any questions Thanks File Aspect Committed Reserves TNCT Adoc File Aspect Committed Reserves Adoc

RE Aspect Contracts Cc Another commenton the Cross Media contract you need to add Esenjay on the signature page Also sometimes on the exhibits you list Helmerich Payne as HP or Helmerichyou may want to make consistent Thanks Original Message From Zivley Jill T Sent Thursday November AM To Nemec Gerald Cc Perlingiere Debra Wallumrod Ellen Thorne Judy Hesse Lisa Subject RE Aspect Contracts Gerald a couple of comments Pricing does not change until nor do other provisions like the keep whole The way you have the contracts drafted it is as if we have new terms beginning now I think the producers will object to this and think we are trying to put something over on them now Can we make the new contracts effective Under Art Contract priceI have a questions about the of First of the Month Nominationwhat about the swing they getShouldnt it be of actuals subject to the keep whole Maybe I am the one confused but could you please call me to discuss Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October PM To Zivley Jill T Cc Perlingiere Debra Hesse Lisa Wallumrod Ellen Subject Aspect Contracts Attached are the two contracts which will replace the single original as we discussed Please review and let me know if you have any questions Thanks File Aspect Committed Reserves TNCT Adoc File Aspect Committed Reserves Adoc

Revised contracts to Aspect et al Cc Gerald were you able to get the contracts w changes out to Aspect et al yesterday I am out this week but am checking email If you need to talk call me on my cell phone Thanks

RENonPrivilegedpst Thanks Judy for getting this started I have a memo to give Gerald w the working interests for the new well and will give you the pricing for the term beginning Thanks Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Monday September AM To Nemec Gerald Cc Zivley Jill T Subject Gerald As a follow up to your discussion on Friday with Jill Zivley regarding the AspectHelmrich Payne et al dedicated lease contract Jill asked me to coordinate with you to get the amendment to this contract prepared Per my discussion with Jill the following items need to be addressed in the amendment Add the new well Change the working interest Include a statement to address our timing for changing working interest to the month succeeding the month that we are notified Extend the contract an additional year from the end of the contract term I will bring you copies of the contract including the assignment from Enron North America to ENA Upstream as well as the working interest sheet as soon as I have them Jill would like to have this contract completed this week since the well is expected to begin flowing any day If you have any questions or need anything else on this request please let me know Thanks Judy

FW ENA Upstream Company LLC Attorney FormsNonPrivilegedpst Hilooks like you recd these before but Im re sending anyway Original Message From Flynn Shawna Sent Friday June PM To Grass John Thorne Judy Nemec Gerald Hodge Jeffrey T Van Hooser Steve Cc Zivley Jill T Bryan Gary Martinez Jennifer Ferries Nelson Roberts Linda Subject ENA Upstream Company LLC Attorney Forms Attached are the following forms for ENA Upstream Company LLC to use for wellhead purchases They can be found in my directorysflynn under ENA UPSTREAM FORMS I can be reached on my cell phone for the next few weeks or leave a message in my voice mail at Enron ext It really has been a pleasure working with all of you and I wish you all the best Take careShawna

FW ENA UPSTREAM COMPANY LLC GTC and CONFIRMNonPrivilegedpst couldnt tell if you had ever recd these or not Original Message From Flynn Shawna Sent Tuesday May AM To Grass John Bryan Gary Zivley Jill T Roberts Linda Ferries Nelson Cc Gray Barbara Braband Sandi Hodge Jeffrey Hyvl Dan Khandker Dayem Subject ENA UPSTREAM COMPANY LLC GTC and CONFIRM Please forward your comments to me

RE EEX Confirm Cc NonPrivilegedpst Judy the confirm language looks good but the price is wrong should be Index less for the first d and Gas Daily flat for gas over that amount each month We can put a MDQ if you want tobut the only way we would have more gas is if they add another well and we could reject it I think if we wanted to based on it not being win the dedicationDo you want to talk more about that Thanks Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Thursday July AM To Nemec Gerald Cc Zivley Jill T Wallumrod Ellen Subject RE EEX Confirm Importance High Gerald Please review the attached completed confirmation for EEX EP and forward to Ellen Wallumrod to send to the customer if you approve We need to get this to the customer today if at all possible Per Jill Zivley there is not an MDQ but she will work with the customer on a monthly basis for volumes above Please let me know if we need to adjust the confirm based on that information Thanks Judy Thorne File EEXEPconfirmdoc File enaupstreamGTCdoc Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Friday June PM To Thorne Judy Subject EEX Confirm Judy Attached is the draft confirm for EEX Can you fill in all the notice information for EEX Also as we discussed we also need to insert the wellfieldlease data Note that there is no MDQ From the printout it looked as though all volumes in excess of MMBtu per day were priced as gas daily If there is an MDQ we will need to insert it Thanks File EEXEPconfirmdoc File enaupstreamGTCdoc

RE AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Cc Hi I think you attached the wrong document Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Tuesday October PM To Thorne Judy Cc Nemec Gerald Zivley Jill T Subject RE AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Here is the revised Confirm Please review File AVISTA Amendmentdoc Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Tuesday October PM To Perlingiere Debra Cc Nemec Gerald Zivley Jill T Subject AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Debra Based on further discussions with the customer Jill Zivley has negotiated a revised price for the amendment that you recently prepared for the Aspect Helmerick Payne et al contract The revised pricing should be of FOM at IF Houston Ship Channel less and of FOM at GD less Please let me know if you have any questions regarding these changes to the amendment We need to send this to the customer by tomorrow morning Thanks Judy

RE AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Cc Hi I think you attached the wrong document Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Tuesday October PM To Thorne Judy Cc Nemec Gerald Zivley Jill T Subject RE AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Here is the revised Confirm Please review File AVISTA Amendmentdoc Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Tuesday October PM To Perlingiere Debra Cc Nemec Gerald Zivley Jill T Subject AspectHelmerick Payne Wilmar etc amendment revision Debra Based on further discussions with the customer Jill Zivley has negotiated a revised price for the amendment that you recently prepared for the Aspect Helmerick Payne et al contract The revised pricing should be of FOM at IF Houston Ship Channel less and of FOM at GD less Please let me know if you have any questions regarding these changes to the amendment We need to send this to the customer by tomorrow morning Thanks Judy

FW Revised Aspect Docs Cc Dayem We are finally ready to send these contracts to Aspect et al Could you please review the language related to price and the keep whole provisions and make sure that this is the same understanding you are also negotiating wDuke Let me know as soon as possible Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Thursday November PM To Zivley Jill T Cc Hesse Lisa Wallumrod Ellen Perlingiere Debra Subject Revised Aspect Docs Attached are clean and redlined versions of the docs with revisions
